name: mailinator
title: Mailinator
description: This extension provides access to Mailinator through the Raycast app. You can view the last emails and SMS from your inbox.
author: lucasarcanjo

commands.name: otp-list
commands.title: List OTP from Inbox
commands.description: Filter OTPs from your Mailinator inbox

commands.name: inbox-list
commands.title: Show Last Emails and SMS
commands.description: Show last emails and SMS from your Mailinator inbox

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
